testcase.classname: To check the Buy Items functionality
testcase.name: To check if user is successful to buy items with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on login page................................................passed And User enters the details.................................................passed And Clicks on Estimate shipping.............................................passed And User check the box to accept the terms and services.....................passed When User clicks on checkout................................................passed Then user is navigated to the Checkout Page.................................passed

testcase.classname: To check the Buy Items functionality
testcase.name: To check if user is able to proceed after entering valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Checkout page..............................................passed And User enters the valid details in fields.................................passed When User hits enter on Continue button.....................................passed Then user is able to proceed further........................................passed

testcase.classname: To check the Buy Items functionality
testcase.name: To check if user is able to proceed after entering invalid
testcase.system-out: Given User landed on Checkout page..........................................passed And User enters the alphanumeric details in First Name......................passed When User press click on Continue button....................................passed Then user is able to go ahead...............................................passed

testcase.classname: To check the Buy Items functionality
testcase.name: To check if user is able to proceed after leaving the mandatory
testcase.system-out: Given User gets on Checkout page............................................passed And User enters the valid First name, Last name.............................passed When User is proceed to click on Continue button............................passed Then user gets a message displayed..........................................passed

testcase.classname: To check the Buy Items functionality
testcase.name: To check if user is able to proceed after entering invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is Checkout page.................................................passed And User enters the First name, Last name...................................passed And User enter the Email without special character '@'......................passed When User clicks on Continue button.........................................passed Then user gets a message....................................................passed
